properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating first full-sized plane to leave the ground on October 9, 1890, in Paris, France, by Clement Ader with steam plane; commemorative cancellation stamp dated October 9, 1985 in Paris; includes information on reverse.
